articles.title: Edward Hillenaar

Edward Hillenaar, MSc, candidate PhD

            Bio
            My name is Edward F. Hillenaar and I am the founder and
            CEO of Total Health Foundation. Through a journey in
            different directions, I now walk a path in which my
            knowledge and life experiences are used for therapy and
            counseling to improve the ‘quality of life’.
            My regular ‘scientific’ education consists respectively
            of the Academy of Physical Education and Physiotherapy in
            The Hague (HALO); Sports and Exercise Science at the
            University of Utrecht (“Sports, Exercise and Health”); and
            Clinical-Health Psychology. Combined with my interest in
            Eastern Buddhist psychology and philosophy, all my knowledge
            and experience can be used for my mission within the Total
            Health Foundation.
            My research interests include psychology, philosophy and
            data science of the origin and nature of human
            consciousness.
            
            
            Skills
            I have 4 years of experience with R statistics
            package, especially experienced in Regression Analysis,
            Factor Analysis and Bayesian statistics
            I am a trainer/coach/therapist in my own company;
            Total Health Foundation
            
            
            Experience
            Training/Coaching/Therapy
            Scientific Research
            Psychology/Philosophy
